generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A paved area along the right side of the road, separated by bollards, where pedestrians are walking, indicating it is a sidewalk.
- building: The large beige structure on the right side of the image and the white building on the left are clearly buildings.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees visible in the background and along the sides of the road, which are part of the vegetation.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a bright, open sky without leaves or obstructions.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk, including a man in a black shirt, a woman in a pink top, and others, all of whom are classified as persons.
- car: Multiple cars are parked on the left side of the road, including a black sedan and a dark-colored car.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole, indicating the presence of a traffic light.
- traffic sign: A yellow traffic sign with black text and symbols, including a "30" speed limit sign, is visible on the right side of the road, indicating the presence of a traffic sign.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including the pole supporting the traffic light and the poles supporting the traffic signs.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible along the left side of the road, separating the road from a sidewalk or pedestrian area.
- terrain: There is a patch of grass visible in the background, behind the fence, which is part of the terrain.
